full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR MR. EPSTEIN DATE 7/6 TIME 7:00 P.M. TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL MESSAGE He said that he got a call from Byron SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR MR. EPSTEIN DATE 7/6 TIME 8:00 P.M. TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR JE DATE 8/July TIME 8:30 P.M. MESSAGE I need a work I not (cash I don't have money) when do you hire again? SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Sarah DATE TIME 8:10 P.M. OF DOJ REDACTION GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 3-I-R S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) DOJ-OGR-00015509

text_blocks.content: He said that he got a call from Byron
I need a work I not (cash I don't have money) when do you hire again?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scan of a spiral-bound notebook containing four 'Important Message' forms. The forms contain handwritten notes and messages, with some information redacted. The document is stamped as a 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT' with a reference number.
